titleInfo.title: Democratic Primary Board election returns signed by Alvin York

mods.abstract: Democratic Primary Board election returns signed by Alvin York as Chairman of the Democratic Primary Board of Fentress County. The return features the primary votes for Horton and Gwinn for Governor; Dodson, Hull, and Todd for U.S. Senator (long term); Brock and Neal for U.S. Senator (short term); Albright, Mitchell, and Owen for Congress; Anderson and Officer for State Senator; and Stockton and Taylor for Floterial Representative.

relatedItem.abstract: Alvin Cullum York (1887-1964) was one of the most decorated soldiers of the First World War. A recipient of the Medal of Honor and the French Legion of Honour, York is considered one of the greatest of Tennesseeâ€™s native sons...
